SMW Subobject for 1NPC ID: 19625Options: ExamineExamine: A Mourner, or plague healer.Release date: 19 July 2005NPC location: Mourner TunnelsIs members only: trueIs variant of: Mourner (Mourner Tunnels)
SMW Subobject for 2NPC ID: 19665Options: ExamineExamine: A Mourner, or plague healer.Release date: 17 October 2005NPC location: Mourner TunnelsIs members only: trueIs variant of: Mourner (Mourner Tunnels)

Mourners are elves that have joined the Prifddinas Death Guard. They can be found in Mourner Tunnels. They were introduced with the Mourning's End Part I quest. They can be killed for elf slayer assignments.

The mourners can be killed for the Mourner outfit they drop, required for Mourning's End Part I and Part II, Within the Light, and Plague's End. However, the outfit must be worn in order to access the headquarters before partial completion of Plague's End.

One non-attackable mourner can be found guarding the entrance to the room where the gnome is being tortured. Two more non-attackable mourners can be found in the tunnels, disciplining the slaves.

After the events of Plague's End, the attackable mourners are replaced by Knights of Ardougne, which have exactly the same stats, although they do not have the same drops and do not count for elf slayer assignments. All other non-attackable mourners disappeared.

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
